snippet: Kobe Bryant severely sprained his left ankle Wednesday night after missing a game-tying shot against the Hawks, while the Heat defeated the Sixers for their 20th straight victory.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Atlanta Hawks defeat Los Angeles Lakers, 96-92; Lakers guard Kobe Bryant sprains ankle after missing game-tying shot; Miami Heat defeat Philadelphia 76ers, 98-94, to win 20 consecutive games; other basketball scores noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JAKE APPLEMAN

lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant severely sprained his left ankle Wednesday night after missing a game-tying shot against the Hawks, while the Heat defeated the Sixers for their 20th straight victory.

headline.seo: Bryant Sprains Ankle in Lakers’ Loss; Heat Extend Winning Streak to 20
headline.main: Bryant Sprains Ankle in Loss; Heat’s Streak at 20
headline.print_headline: Bryant Sprains Ankle in Loss; Heat’s Streak at 20
